work.title: Marinade Finance
work.description: After competing in the Solana hackathon I was invited to participate in full stack development for a winning project. We built out landing pages and some in-app functionality. Paid in crypto.

work.title: Code Nation
work.description: I built multiple reporting/marketing websites for Code Nation.

work.title: Munchery
work.description: I conducted a performance audit on the Munchery website and platform.  I was able to decrease page loading times by over 30% with code splitting and image optmizations.

work.title: COCO5
work.description: I built the frontend of a Shopify store for a leading coconut water company in North America.
An example of a Headless E-commerce store using Gatsby.js and the shopify-buy SDK.
